name: Twineedle
description: You fire two sharp projectiles at a creature in range. They do not have to target the same creature. Make two ranged attack rolls, dealing 1d4 + MOVE bug damage on each hit. If the natural roll of either attack is a 19 or 20, the target is poisoned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.

effect.name: Badly startles Pok√©mon that used a move of the same type.
effect.effect: Pokemon that used a move of the same contest type must make a CHA Saving Throw against Intimidation/Persuasion DC.
